Title: Blessings for the Broken Teacher (e266)
Description:
Award Winning teacher Aimee Ross talks about how she’s learned from her students through struggle, brokenness and the ups and downs of life. Today’s show is an inspiring look into the journey of teaching, being recognized for your work, and realizing that the students really are why we teach.

SHOW NOTES: www.coolcatteacher.com/e266
